summary: Adds a follower NPC to the exterior of the Windhelm Stables. This NPC can be sacrificed to Boethiah.
descriptionHtml:
This is a resource for Skyrim's quest "Boethiah's Calling". "Boethiah's Victim" is as simple as it sounds. It adds a follower NPC to the exterior of the Windhelm Stables. This NPC is intended as a replacement for all other NPC's one would otherwise choose from as a sacrifice to the Daedric prince. Save the original game characters, and those of its DLC's for a better purpose.

The mod has been tested and found working. No further updates should be expected. The follower NPC is not respawning, as he's supposed to be sacrificed anyway.

=x=x=x=x=x=x=x=x=x=x=x=x=x=x=x=x=x=x=x=x=x=x=x=x=x=x=x=x=x=x=x=x=

Side note:

This is not the only mod I've created and released. If you take a look at the list, maybe you'll find something else you like as well.
author: King Rick
